14 void grid::InfoGeometry(const desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray::ConstPtr& msg)
15 {
16  Object_radius.clear();
17  Object_height.clear();
18  Object_position.clear();
19 
20  std::cout<<"msg->geometries.size(): "<<msg->geometries.size()<<std::endl;
21  //get info for calculates objects surface
22  for(unsigned int i=0; i < msg->geometries.size(); i++)
23  {
24  KDL::Frame frame_obj;
25  Object_radius.push_back(msg->geometries[i].info[0]); //radius
26  Object_height.push_back(msg->geometries[i].info[1]); //height
27 
28  tf::poseMsgToKDL(msg->geometries[i].pose, frame_obj);
29  Object_position.push_back(frame_obj);
30  }
31 
32 }

36 void grid::gridspace(const std_msgs::Float64MultiArray::ConstPtr &msg)
37 {
38  std::cout<<"sms ricevuto"<<std::endl;
39  int count = 0;
40  vect_pos.data[0] = 0;
41  vect_pos.data[1] = 0;
42  vect_pos.data[2] = 0;
43 
44  for( double i = msg->data[0]; i <= msg->data[1]; i = i + msg->data[2] )
45  {
46  vect_pos.data[0] = i;
47  for( double j = msg->data[3]; j <= msg->data[4]; j = j + msg->data[5] )

49  vect_pos.data[1] = j;
50  for( double k = msg->data[6]; k <= msg->data[7]; k = k + msg->data[8] )
51  {
52  vect_pos.data[2] = k;
53  GetForceAndDraw(vect_pos, count);
54  count = count + 1 ;
55  }
56 
57  }
58  }

60  MinAndMAx = GetMinAndMax(Force_norm);

71 void grid::DrawArrow( KDL::Vector &gridspace_Force, KDL::Vector &gridspace_point, int K, double Fmin, double Fmax )
72 {
73  // std::cout<<"disegno"<<std::endl;
74 
75  int32_t shape = visualization_msgs::Marker::ARROW;
76  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
77 
78  // Set the frame ID and timestamp. See the TF tutorials for information on these.
79  marker.header.frame_id = "vito_anchor";
80  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
81  marker.ns = "basic_shapes";
82  marker.id = K;
83  marker.type = shape;
84  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
85  marker.pose.position.x = gridspace_point.x();
86  marker.pose.position.y = gridspace_point.y();
87  marker.pose.position.z = gridspace_point.z();
88 
89  Eigen::Quaterniond quat;
90  quat = RotationMarker(gridspace_Force, gridspace_point);
91 
92  marker.pose.orientation.x = quat.x();
93  marker.pose.orientation.y = quat.y();
94  marker.pose.orientation.z = quat.z();
95  marker.pose.orientation.w = quat.w();
96 
97  marker.scale.x = Scale(Fmin,Fmax, gridspace_Force.Norm());
98  marker.scale.y = 0.02;
99  marker.scale.z = 0.02;
100 
101  marker.color.r = ((gridspace_Force.Norm()-Fmin)/(Fmax-Fmin));
102  marker.color.g = 1 - marker.color.r ;
103  marker.color.b = 0.0f;
104  marker.color.a = 0.5;
105  marker.lifetime = ros::Duration(100);
106 
107  vect_marker.markers.push_back(marker);
108 }
109 
110 double Scale(double Fmin, double Fmax, double Force_field_norm )
111 {
112  //y=mx+q with P1=(F_min,0.01), P2=(F_max,1)
113  double m = ((1-0.01)/(Fmax-Fmin));
114  double y = ((Force_field_norm - Fmin)*m)+0.01;
115 
116  return y;
117 
118 }
119 std::pair<double,double> grid::GetMinAndMax(std::vector<double> &field)
120 {
121  std::pair<double,double> MinAndMAx;
122  // std::vector<double>::iterator result = std::min_element(std::begin(field), std::end(field));
123  // int index_min = std::distance(std::begin(field), result);
124 
125  // std::vector<double>::iterator max = std::max_element(std::begin(field), std::end(field));
126  // int index_max = std::distance(std::begin(field), max);
127 
128  MinAndMAx.first = *std::min_element(std::begin(field), std::end(field));
129  MinAndMAx.second = *std::max_element(std::begin(field), std::end(field));
130 
131  std::cout<<"MinAndMAx.first : "<<MinAndMAx.first <<std::endl;
132  std::cout<<"MinAndMAx.second : "<<MinAndMAx.second <<std::endl;
133 
134  return MinAndMAx;
135 }

138 Eigen::Quaterniond grid::RotationMarker(KDL::Vector &ris_Force, KDL::Vector &point)
139 {
140  // KDL::Vector x(1,0,0);
141  // double pi = 3.14159264;
142  // double angle = std::acos( (x.dot(ris_Force))/(x.Norm()*ris_Force.Norm()))*180/pi;
143  // KDL::Vector axis(0,0,0);
144  // axis = (x * ris_Force) / (x *ris_Force).Norm();
145 
146 
147  Eigen::Vector3d x(1,0,0);
148  Eigen::Vector3d Force_eigen(ris_Force.x(),ris_Force.y(),ris_Force.z());
149  double pi = 3.14159264;
150  double angle = std::acos( (x.dot(Force_eigen))/(x.norm()*Force_eigen.norm()));
151  // std::cout<<"angle: "<<angle<<std::endl;
152  Eigen::Matrix3d transformation_ = Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
153  // Eigen::Quaterniond quat_eigen_hand(transformation_);
154  // if(angle != 0)
155  // {
156  Eigen::Vector3d axis(0,0,0);
157  axis = (x.cross(Force_eigen)) / (x.cross(Force_eigen)).norm();
158  transformation_ = Eigen::AngleAxisd(angle, axis);
159 
160  // std::cout<<"axis: "<<axis[0]<<'\t'<<axis[1]<<'\t'<<axis[2]<<std::endl;
161  // // Eigen::Matrix3d transformation_ = Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
162  // Eigen::Vector3d row0(axis[0]*axis[0]*(1-cos(angle))+cos(angle), axis[0]*axis[1]*(1-cos(angle))-axis[2]*sin(angle), axis[0]*axis[2]*(1-cos(angle))+axis[1]*sin(angle));
163  // Eigen::Vector3d row1(axis[0]*axis[1]*(1-cos(angle))+axis[2]*sin(angle), axis[1]*axis[1]*(1-cos(angle))+cos(angle), axis[1]*axis[2]*(1-cos(angle))-axis[0]*sin(angle));
164  // Eigen::Vector3d row2(axis[0]*axis[2]*(1-cos(angle))-axis[1]*sin(angle), axis[1]*axis[2]*(1-cos(angle))+axis[0]*sin(angle),axis[2]*axis[2]*(1-cos(angle))+cos(angle));
165 
166  // transformation_.row(0) << row0.transpose();
167  // transformation_.row(1) << row1.transpose();
168  // transformation_.row(2) << row2.transpose();
169  Eigen::Quaterniond quat_eigen_hand(transformation_);
170  // std::cout<<"quat_eigen_hand: "<<quat_eigen_hand.x()<<'\t'<<quat_eigen_hand.y()<<'\t'<<quat_eigen_hand.z()<<'\t'<<quat_eigen_hand.w()<<std::endl;
171  // }
172 
173  return quat_eigen_hand.normalized();
174 
175 }

177 void grid::GetForceAndDraw(KDL::Vector &point_pos, int num)
178 {
179  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> > F_rep;
180  // std::cout<<"point: "<<point_pos[0]<<'\t'<<point_pos[1]<<'\t'<<point_pos[2]<<std::endl;
181  //repulsive with obj
182  for(unsigned int i=0; i < Object_position.size(); i++)
183  {
184  double influence = Object_radius[i] + 0.2;
185  std::vector<KDL::Vector> pos;
186  pos.push_back(point_pos);
187  std::pair<Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>, double> ForceAndIndex;
188  ForceAndIndex = pfc.GetRepulsiveForce(pos, influence, Object_position[i], Object_radius[i], Object_height[i]);
189  F_rep.push_back(ForceAndIndex.first);
190  }
191 
192  Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> f = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();
193 
194  for(unsigned int k=0; k < F_rep.size();k++)
195  {
196  f = f + F_rep[k];
197  }
198 
199  //repulsive with table
200  std::pair<Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>, double> ForceAndIndex_table;
201  KDL::Vector Table_position(0,0,0.15);
202  std::vector<double> dist;
203  dist.push_back(- Table_position.z() + point_pos.z() );
204 
205  ForceAndIndex_table = pfc.RepulsiveWithTable(dist);
206 
207  Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> Force_tot_grid;
208  Force_tot_grid = f + ForceAndIndex_table.first;
209  // std::cout<<"ForceAndIndex_table.first: "<<ForceAndIndex_table.first<<std::endl;
210  // std::cout<<"f: "<<f<<std::endl;
211 
212  // std::cout<<"Force: "<< Force_tot_grid(0) <<'\t'<<Force_tot_grid(1)<<'\t'<<Force_tot_grid(2)<<std::endl;
213  KDL::Vector force_vect(Force_tot_grid(0), Force_tot_grid(1),Force_tot_grid(2));
214  KDL::Vector null(0,0,0);
215 
216  if(!Equal(force_vect,null,0.05))
217  {
218  Force_norm.push_back(force_vect.Norm());
219  Force.push_back(force_vect);
220  Total_point.push_back(point_pos);
221  }
222 }
